channel.title: Call method from inside a package
channel.description: So, I'm settin my server up so that I use packages for things instead of the same directory (doesn't really matter, I get the problem either way) I need to know how to call a non-static method from inside the other class file I can call static methods just fine, but I need to be able to call a frame method, which, I can't make static or face more problems

item.title: Call method from inside a package

item.description:

On another topic

or instance.nonstaticmethod()

Or that.

So, I’m settin my server up so that I use packages for things instead of the same directory (doesn’t really matter, I get the problem either way)
